Articles.Content: Has anyone made or attempted to make a trust wing VTO craft? I been working on one with no success. Something like this http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Focke-Wulf_Triebfl%C3%BCgel
I tried making one with the Damned Robotics mod, but it kept tearing itself apart without struts, and was nigh-impossible to turn due to gyroscopic effects.
I recall seeing someone make that using the Robotics thing in one of the challenge threads, I can\'t seem to find it though.
well it is hard but the one thing you need to know is that you need your plane to be extremely stable or you flip over easily
I did make one, with all stock parts, however it meant that the pod was rotating as well, and I couldn\'t steer it. So the jets eventually made it flip over and crash.
I didn\'t know about this robotics pack. I just got it and I am going to see what I can come up with now.
